name: High Score Screen Burn Slow Burn
name_original: High Score Screen Burn Slow Burn
description:
Objective: Get the high score!

Players: One or fewer

Controls: Maybe

How to play:

Start the game. Watch for a minute or two. Walk away. Come back in half an hour and check in. Walk away. Come back the following day, week, month. Check in. Do you have the high score yet?

Estimated playtime: 6-12 months

Secret tip:

If you’d like to be slightly more active in your play, be sure your sound is on. It might occasionally rouse you to alertness!

Fun fact:

High Score Slow Burn Screen Burn was exhibited as part of the Open Circuits gallery show at Carroll University in Waukesha, Wisconsin, September - October, 2019!

Play and buy:

Requires Stella or another Atari 2600 emulator to play.  You can purchase a physical cart of this game from 8-Bit Classics.
